content: decided to make a fun little hat for my brother in law that was inspired by the oh so amazing fornicating moose pattern that is seen in a lot of places i wanted to add the words f*ck the cold because i knew he would love it now i wrote up this pattern from my memory and any scribbles i could find on my chart paper so please forgive me for any mistakes you may find please message me if you found anything wrong and i ll do my best to help fix it this hat will fit most made to fit a 21 head and can be blocked a bit or you can change needles sizes if you need for it to be a bit bigger you will need two colors or more if you re feeling adventurous for this hat one ball of each color is way more than enough enjoy
